body: Got limp on the last page lmao

Anyway, what was he trying to teach her? Spying on somebody? " If I didnt do that, you wouldn't let me see you" now what could he mean by that? If he didnt find another evidence of her mom and bro having sex, he wouldn't have produced another thing to use to blackmail her, thus her not seeing him?? Then she can reverse uno him by telling the police that this guy installed a spy camera in their home and get him to jail then boom happy end. I'd really be mad tho if she went through hell with him. If it was just cunnilings then it should be fine. I also just found out that incest is legal in Japan holy cow. Break up with husband then continue having incestuous relationship with son. Lol anyway if this story somehow leads somewhere not nice then chapter 3 or 4 may just be my ending of the story, the rest Ill pretend they did not happen.  If, that is. Noriko x Takashi all the way. And sis. Mff oyakodon incest. Pogchamp.

Poor older sister had to spread her legs to keep her family's secret. Hope she gets out of that circumstance. I dont see it w/o the mother and son's incestuous relationship getting disclosed tho. The 4th chapter is already out somewhere and most of it seem to contain the continuation of the mom & son having sex, and prolly a lil bit of the sister's relationship with the neighbor.. Maybe. Just taking a guess. Anyway, considering most of  Kojima Miu's past works(that aren't my cup of tea, except Nishida Family), I still hope this story will have a nice ending. And the sister will be set free, hopefully. Kill the bastard. Putting camera in somebody else's home is definitely a crime. You can use that to blackmail him. If he fights back and discloses the mom & son's relationship then fuck it.  All hell breaks loose.
Lol, now that an ugly bastard is doing it with the sister, now we must not expect this to have a wholesome ending.
